experiences.title: Software Development Intern
experiences.description:
Delivered full-stack functionality using Java Spring Boot and Angular, translating business requirements into 
backend APIs and user-facing components facilitating data flows and intuitive user experience 
• Designed and implemented a bulk formulary upload feature for pharmacy users, validating and persisting drug 
data in compliance with enterprise schemas 
• Analyzed client needs and existing system constraints to challenge legacy database design assumptions, 
proposing improvements to the schema that increased long-term maintainability 
• Worked within a Scrum team using Jira to refine backlog items, participate in sprint planning and daily standups, 
and deliver features aligned with Product Owner priorities

experiences.title: Product and Project Lead - RideSafe
experiences.description:
• Serve as creator and technical lead for RideSafe, a motorcycle safety application that leverages public crash data, 
external APIs, and risk-based routing algorithms to generate risk scores for intersections, road segments, and 
route options across Texas 
• Position RideSafe as a competitive entry for the SCLC 2026 Competition 
• Lead end-to-end product and technical ownership for RideSafe, defining MVP scope and roadmap by translating 
user needs and crash-risk research into prioritized features, user stories, acceptance criteria, and a scalable 
architecture validated through personas and iterative feedback

experiences.title: Off-Campus Student Representative
experiences.organization: Residents Interhall Congress - University of Arkansas
experiences.description:
• Elected as one of two representatives for ~500 off-campus students, evaluating and advancing ~20 funding 
proposals and allocating a $42K annual budget toward social, wellness, and academic initiatives 
• Supported programs that connected hundreds of students to campus life, balancing engagement goals and 
community impact, with events reaching up to 80 attendees and an estimated 400–1,000 students annually

experiences.title: ToGo Specialist
experiences.description:
• Managed high-volume customer interactions in a fast-paced environment.
• Handled order accuracy, payment processing, and issue resolution.
• Maintained professional communication with guests during peak hours.
• Balanced multiple tasks simultaneously while meeting time-sensitive deadlines.
• Provided consistent customer experience under pressure.
